item.title: Chris Reddington
item.description: Welsh Tech Geek, Cloud Advocate, Musical Theatre Enthusiast and Improving Improviser! Chris is currently a Senior Engineer on Microsoft’s FastTrack for Azure team.

item.title: Maria Vrabie
item.description: Maria is an engineer working in the FastTrack for Azure team within the Engineering organization at Microsoft. She is currently helping various businesses implement Azure solutions focusing on Intelligent agents, Cognitive Services, as well as analytics. Hackathons enthusiast and inclusion advocate, she has been volunteering or mentoring at different STEM events since her time back in university.

item.title: Will Eastbury
item.description: Will works on the FastTrack for Azure Engineering team at Microsoft, helping customers to build, deploy and scale cloud solutions.
